snippet.title: Dead Cells - Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. (Animated trailer)
snippet.description:
Dead Cells, the indie smash hit, crawls out of Steam's Early Access to take over your computer, and a good three days straight of your life. Take a ton of rogue, add in a dash of vania, smoosh them together and you'll find yourself holding onto one hell of time waster! Gameplay trailer: https://youtu.be/02G3GUt6Nzo

We've got something for every one: The Nintendo Switch Dead Cells, the PS4 Dead Cells, the Xbox One Dead Cells and, hell, we've even got shiny disc in a box Dead Cells!

Over here:
https://dead-cells.com/products

Music By: Yoann Laulan (Valmont)
https://valmontderagondas.bandcamp.com/

Kickass trailer by the talented (and oh so French) Bobby Prod 
http://bobbyprod.com/
https://www.facebook.com/BobbyProdAnimation/
https://www.instagram.com/bobbyprod/
https://twitter.com/bobbyprod_off

Credits: Bobby Prod 

Producer
David Alric

Production Manager:
Jérôme Bonnaventurier

Director
Vincent Verniers

Storyboard 
Vincent Verniers
Cédric Hérole

Layout Backgrounds Artist
Victor Delorme

Layout Backgrounds Painters
Victor Delorme
Valérie Bousquié

Animators
Balak
Valérie Bousquié
Clément Kubicek
Mandimby Lebon
Vincent Verniers

Colorist
Gauthier Le Bris

FX
Eric Lefaure

Compositing
Gregoire Peyrot
